content: this legal document provides an update on a legal case involving multiple parties it mentions that a notary was involved on december 13 2005 the document specifies the cost and duration of the case the final resolution involves dividing the assets among the parties specifically the parties own shares in a courtyard in castelfidardo two parties are assigned parking spaces while the rest of the courtyard is common the document assigns specific shares to each party in a real estate unit in castelfidardo detailing their value it mentions the presence of witnesses and the consent of the parties the document also explains the history of the courtyards coownership and the succession of one of the parties it concludes by dividing the shares among the parties specifying the real estate units assigned to each party and their respective values a deed letter and a planimetric drawing of the property are attached to the document the text briefly mentions a sale but does not provide further details
